participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and creative, Emily has a gentle demeanor and a passion for music. She often feels misunderstood due to her dreams.
participant_1.background: i play the piano and guitar and sing. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. my parents aren't very supportive of my dream. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Practical and nurturing, Jason is skilled with his hands and has a strong connection to nature. He values hard work and personal growth.
participant_2.background: i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. i just got a job working in a gas station. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening.

content.text: Do you want to talk with me
